dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
dependencies.name: openssl

cool animations!
dependencies.name: py-alive-progress

dependencies.description:
tree is a library for working with nested data structures. In a way,
tree generalizes the builtin map() function which only supports flat
sequences, and allows to apply a function to each leaf preserving the
overall structure.
dependencies.name: py-dm-tree

dependencies.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.
dependencies.name: py-hatchling

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Reusable Process Pool Executor
dependencies.name: py-loky

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.name: py-pymoo

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
